Html:
Hi,

I have been working on an Angular version of this awesome toolkit and have posted my current version with a demo application on GitHub.

For more information and some images go here.

I have mentioned that it is a rework of the XrmServiceToolkit, specifically for Angular.

I tried reaching out to you guys through a message on codeplex. But got no response yet. So I put my version up today.

Hope you guys don't mind!
